{{Description|It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.}}
'''Instructor's Tea Cup''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Instructor]].

==Description==
Every military school student knows that the so-called "free training time" could not have anything less to do with freedom.<br />The instructor sits back and watches while the students train rigorously in the field.<br />A cup of black tea with a little too much sugar in it marks a typical afternoon for the instructor.<br />This peaceful time is a privilege of the instructor, and the embodiment of his authority.
